mapper.sql: select weighing_tank_id, tenant_id, fire_zone_id, weighing_tank_number, full_tank_upper_limit, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from laocz_weighing_tank
mapper.select:
SELECT gpi.point_type, gpi.point_id, gpi.point_name FROM laocz_weighing_tank lwt JOIN laocz_weighing_tank_point lwtp ON lwt.weighing_tank_id = lwtp.weighing_tank_id LEFT JOIN grass_point_info gpi ON gpi.id = lwtp.point_primary_key
and lwt.weighing_tank_id = #{weighingTankId}
mapper.insert:
insert into laocz_weighing_tank ( weighing_tank_id , tenant_id , fire_zone_id , weighing_tank_number , full_tank_upper_limit , create_by , create_time , update_by , update_time , remark) values
( #{item.weighingTankId}, #{item.tenantId}, #{item.fireZoneId}, #{item.weighingTankNumber}, #{item.fullTankUpperLimit}, #{item.createBy}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateBy}, #{item.updateTime}, #{item.remark})
